{EquipmentType:"meleeWeapon",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"teran",display:{Name:"\"§6Dernières volontés d'Hélène\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7La folie prend enfin un sens,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7quand elle se laisse guider par la vengeance.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Madness finally gains meaning,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7when it lets itself be guided by revenge.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7SPD§a1 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§a1\"}"]},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_aspect",lvl:2s},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:11s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attack_damage,Name:generic.attack_damage,Amount:11.22,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,10004,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.attack_speed,Name:generic.attack_speed,Amount:-0.35,Operation:1,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,20004,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.02,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,30004,0,10000]}]}
